item.title: Experienced Video Creator Needed for Web Application Demo Video for Kickstarter Campaign - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced video creator to produce an engaging and professional demo video for our innovative web application. This video will be a key component of our Kickstarter campaign, helping us showcase the unique features and benefits of our product to potential backers.

What We Need:

A 2-3 minute demo video that highlights the key features and benefits of our web application.
Professional quality production, including clear audio, smooth transitions, and captivating visuals.
Creative input on the script and storyboard to ensure the video is compelling and informative.
Ability to work closely with our team to understand the product and its unique selling points.
Skills Required:

Proven experience in creating high-quality demo or promotional videos.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
Strong storytelling skills and a creative mindset.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with a team.
Experience with Kickstarter or other crowdfunding platforms is a plus.
How We Work:

We value clear and open communication and are available for regular check-ins and feedback sessions.
Our team works collaboratively and values creative input and ideas.
We are currently not in a position to offer upfront payment. However, we are committed to offering a generous percentage of the funds raised through our Kickstarter campaign to the video creator. This amount is expected to exceed the typical cost of producing such a video.
About Us:

*****We are passionate about our web application and believe it has the potential to make a significant impact. Unfortunately, we are currently unable to pay for services upfront. Instead, we are offering a substantial share of the Kickstarter campaign funds to the video creator who helps bring our vision to life. We believe this arrangement not only shows our commitment to the project but also ensures that your efforts are well-rewarded.*****

If you are excited about working on a project with great potential and are willing to partner with us on this journey, we would love to hear from you. Please include examples of your previous work and a brief explanation of why you are interested in this opportunity in your application.


Posted On: June 28, 2024 06:08 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Commercial
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Quality Assurance (QA) Video Checker for Video Editing Agency - Upwork
item.description:
I’m looking for a quality assurance expert to help with the video reviewing process and to ensure video updates and communications are ongoing to deliver videos before deadlines.

This is on demand, which means you track your hours when there is a video to edit.
You work comfortably in your own timezone however a strong preference for somebody who could allocate time in the daytime AEST hours.

The ideal candidate will have a good understanding of video editing so you know if something is out of place or something can be added to improve video quality. You will also need to know perfect English to be able to pickup on any potential spelling errors.

Looking for a long term partnership, more than a year.

Please include the phrase “Aslani” at the top of your proposal to be considered for this role. Failure to include the phrase will result in an auto declined application.

Hourly Range: $3.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 06:00 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Virtual Assistance, Communications, Video Editing
Skills: Virtual Assistance, Communications, Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Showreel Video Creation with AI Voice Over and Music - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented After Effects expert to create a captivating showreel video for our promotional purposes. The video should be approximately 1-2 minutes long and should showcase the best highlights of our brand. In addition, we require the ability to add AI generated voice over and music to enhance the overall quality of the video.

  Skills required:
  - Proficiency in After Effects
  - Video editing and composition
  - Experience with AI-generated voice over
  - Knowledge of music synchronisation and editing
  
  This small project can be completed within 1 to 3 months. We seek an intermediate-level professional who can bring creativity and innovation to our showreel video.

  We would love to hear from you if you have the skills and expertise to deliver an outstanding showreel video. Please include samples of your previous work in your application.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 05:43 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Audio Editing, Voice-Over, Audio Production, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Audio Editing, Voice-Over, Audio Production, Video Production

item.title: Video Editor for Youtube Vlog - Upwork
item.description:
¡Hola!

Estoy buscando un editor de video para mi canal de YouTube. Principalmente, necesito alguien que pueda editar videos en formato vlog que yo le proporcionaré, siguiendo una estética moderna y minimalista, similar a los estilos de las fuentes Helvética o Inter. El trabajo incluirá:

• Edición de videos en formato vlog.
• Aplicación de efectos leves, especialmente utilizando rótulos y textos.
• Creación de miniaturas atractivas para los videos.

Requisitos:

• Experiencia en edición de videos para YouTube.
• Conocimiento y uso de estilos modernos y minimalistas en la edición.
• Habilidad para crear miniaturas llamativas y efectivas, con mi guía.
• Atención al detalles y cumplimiento de plazos.

Proceso de Selección:
Para encontrar al editor adecuado, haremos una prueba con un video inicial. Envíame tu propuesta y muestras de trabajos anteriores. La prueba que más me guste se quedará con el contrato y seguiré contratando a esa persona para aproximadamente 1-2 videos semanales.

Estoy buscando a alguien con quien pueda trabajar a largo plazo, así que si demuestras ser confiable y talentoso, habrá un flujo constante de trabajo.

¡Espero trabajar contigo!

Presupuesto:
Por favor, incluye tus tarifas por video en la propuesta.

Criterios de Evaluación de la Prueba:

• Calidad de la edición.
• Adherencia al estilo moderno y minimalista.
• Creatividad y uso efectivo de rótulos y efectos.
• Calidad y atractivo de la miniatura.

¡Gracias!


Hourly Range: $8.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 05:29 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: Spain
click to apply

item.title: Looking for a video editor in the military niche - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor:

We run a TikTok/YouTube channel focused on military videos and are seeking a talented video editor to join our team.

We will provide the video script and voiceover, and your task will be to edit the videos. The length of the videos will be around 60 seconds each.

We’re aiming for a long-term collaboration, so if you’re interested, please let me know. I can send you some samples of the type of videos we produce so you can see if it’s a good fit for you.

If you have experience editing TikTok/YouTube videos, please attach samples of your previous work.

Here are some example channels similar to ours:

https://www.tiktok.com/@gunnerstories/video/7371929357222202656

https://www.tiktok.com/@armedstories/video/7380845498753699105

https://www.tiktok.com/@military.tales/video/7357103915667688736

the payment will be 5$ a video and we will order 14 a week (70$ a week).

Looking forward to the possibility of working together!

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 28, 2024 05:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Gaming Videos - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking a skilled video editor to help with editing my Bitlife gaming videos as close to my editing style as possible: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SMEYHV1Uz9c.

You should be able to create fast-paced content with comedic sound effects that align with the nature of my gaming videos. This role requires a strong creative eye and the ability to maintain the humor and excitement throughout the video. It is important to edit footage in a way that engages the audience. If you have experience in editing gaming videos and possess the necessary skills, I would love to hear from you. Knowledge of the game Bitlife is a bonus!

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Fast paced content creation
- Sound effects
- Comedic timing
- Creativity
- Ability to work with limited instruction

Footage is usually approx. 30 minutes and videos would have to be at least 15 minutes after editing. This would be a long term gig if we work well together! Would need 1-2 videos edited a week at $40 a video.

Please write the word "token" at the top of your application so I know you read everything.

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 28, 2024 05:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Final Cut Pro, Audio Editing, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Final Cut Pro, Audio Editing, Motion Graphics
Country: Canada
click to apply
